tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RobotNavigationData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    sector_id INT,
    navigation_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    coordinates JSON
);

CREATE TABLE Navigation (
  navigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_id INT,
  waypoint_id INT,
  distance DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robot(robot_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (waypoint_id) REFERENCES Waypoint(waypoint_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Sensor (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  range INT,
  accuracy FLOAT,
  robot_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robot(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Navigation (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_location VARCHAR(100),
  distance INT,
  robot_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robot(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Log (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  message TEXT,
  robot_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robot(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Robot (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
model VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
manufacture_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE NavigationData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
robot_id INT NOT NULL,
location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
robot_id INT NOT NULL,
sensor_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
value FLOAT NOT NULL,
timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE CommandLog (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
robot_id INT NOT NULL,
command_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
issued_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE BatteryStatus (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
robot_id INT NOT NULL,
charge_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
time_stamp TIMESTAMP);
